comments.author: adrian.kalla+bugzilla@gmail.com
comments.text:
*Probably* since the places-bookmarks landing, it is not possible to right-click on bookmarks in *folders* on the personal-toolbar/bookmarks-bar. In Sm 2.0 and still in Sm 2.1b3pre nightlies on Windows, a right-click on such a bookmark opens the context-menu. On Mac with Sm 2.1 it's not the case anymore.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Create a folder on the personal toolbar
2) Place a bookmark in that folder
3) Open the folder and right-click on that bookmark

Current result:
-nothing happens

Expected result:
-context menu opens
